title: UBS Advisor Adam Epstein on Unexpected ESG Investments
description: A private market real estate deal-plans to convert a New York City apartment tower to a homeless shelter-appealed to clients because the results could be seen locally and also offered outsized yield.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: A private market real estate deal-plans to convert a New York City apartment tower to a homeless shelter-appealed to clients because the results could be seen locally and also offered outsized yield.
